name: Magiisto, kombinu!
description:
This game was made for the 2nd bevy jam  in 10 days.

You are a Wizard in an evergrowing hoard of zombies. Survive as long as you can by combining elements to create different spells.

The goal is to achieve as many points as you can by killing enemies. Points are also used to craft new spells. Can you discover all 9 Spells in  a single run?

Notice: There is a bug in the web version that makes it impossible to use the left- and right mouse buttons at the same  time. This limitation does not exist in the native versions so I advise to download the game and play that instead.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Tab to open the combining menu
  • Left and right mouse buttons and E for your three active spells. You can select spells in the menu by hovering over spell and pressing the corresponding button.
